website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable value headphones providing easy portability and impressive durability.
pros: Well-priced over-ear wired headphones offered in a variety of colours
Folds conveniently for storage and travel
Includes two lengthy cords that connect to most devices
cons: Wired option is less convenient than wireless
Some outside noise may seep through

customer_reviews.title: Surprising quality for such a bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: After many attempts to find a suitable replacement, for my old Sennheiser 330's, I came upon these, from OneOdio .The price drew my attention, and having read the reviews and checked the description, I made my purchase. They arrived very quickly, the packaging and product finish, is excellent, and so now to the performance.. Making allowance for my age,and natural hearing wear and tear, I was still surprised just how much detail I had slowly lost over the years, When playing music that I was very familiar with ( which is always a good idea) it was really nice to hear the full range of the spectrum again. Highly recommended. P G Croft.
customer_reviews.author: P. G. Croft

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earlier this year on Prime day, but held off reviewing them for a while to see if they lasted. Ive given up on wireless headphones as the charge never lasts long enough so i thought id give these a go as the reviews were pretty good and they haven't disappointed so far! For a start they don't fall off my head when I'm moving around, and the sound quality is really very good. Noise leakage happens, but isn't terrible. Obviously there are going to be better ones out there but i actually prefer these to the last pair of Bose that I had. They are nicely padded and are easy to fold up if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Salann31

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing !!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love deep, rich, bass and had resigned myself after a few weeks of searching for the perfect headphones, that I would have to spend upwards of £250.... but then I happened upon the reviews for these beauties!!! Incredible value for money and amazing bass!!! Don't understand how OneOdio have done it for less than £30, but very very glad they did. Big thanks to them and to the customer reviews that led me down this path 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Sound
customer_reviews.text: These are brilliant. The sound from my hi fi especially audiophile vinyl. They also give excellent sound from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: paulgarner

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Sound!..... But all depends on the input source.
customer_reviews.text: I first plugged this my old ipod using neutron music player and thought the sound to be so-so, nothing to brag about...... Then I plugged into my Macpro's line out jack, listening to flac music playing on vlc and Wow! What a transformation! Excellent. Then it was time for Apollo 11 (2019) using vlc and on the goose bump raising liftoff of the Saturn 5 rocket, the ground shaking vibration could be felt in my tippy toes.....I can't see the need for more bass,,,,,These are excellent, outstanding headphones at a rock bottom price, Great Value but results vary from music source to music source.......if they don't sound good at first, try another input.....
customer_reviews.author: Lionel Olay

customer_reviews.title: Nasty cheap made headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I thought they looked good..I'm sitting here writing this just after my 1st trial with them..plug sockets ,small jack didn't work at all, coming through one speaker. As soon as I opened them ,I wasn't happy ,cheap made..nasty infact..I thought with them being reduced from £70 to 20..they can't be bad ..there worse..sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones arrived at the time promised. They were well packed and came in a very small box. They fold down very small. My first impression was they looked very good and were well made. They come with two leads with different sized plugs and therefore fit both full size hi fi and small portable devices. The sound is very clear and detailed and uniform across all frequencies. I like these headphones very much. You get a very good set of headphones for very little money.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford W. Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound quality, comfortable, but a bit bulky.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are very good both in terms of sound quality and also fit. I have a hearing impaired relative who needs the crispest sound and she felt they were the best tried so far (I ordered her a second set). The headphones look robust but might be a bit bulky for some people and not best for travelling light. I think they are more a professional product design. They are comfortable to wear unless they are put on the wrong way round in which case they pinch the ears somewhat - check that the ear pieces twist inwards to the front before putting on.
customer_reviews.author: JamesC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for musicians and especially Guitarists.
customer_reviews.text: Truly excellent at the price, perfect for guitarists or other musicians including DJ's as it has a proper 1⁄4" jack plug which goes into an amp, not a split jack which more than often loses it's contact, the small 6.3mm goes into the headphones, the lead is just the right size and is partially coiled so you do not trip up on it, and the headphone sound is excellent and they are fold-able! 10/10 :).
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Doust

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as use for an amp, the sound quality is good (on par with my 2 year old set of beats soundwise). Can hear sounds outside the headphones at low volumes but this is not a problem once turned up. Tried these with my phone, the quality was excellent from my phone. No distortion of sound and reasonably loud. These are quite comfy headphones to wear, I forget they are on. Compared to Beats which feel like an ear corset, the OneOdio feels like an ear glove (comfy instead of squeezing). The design is on the larger side. Slightly dented box but did not affect quality of the product. I am yet to test the Shareport feature.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and have used them every day for the past 6-12 months and they are fantastic, i'm using the coiled wire so it has a nice bit of stretch if needed, teh ear surrounds are still soft and have not cracked or anything, in fact they look as good as new. Only gripe with them is they dont have a volume on teh cable so have to use PC to turn them UP/Down. Other than that though, still working as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: lisa5555

customer_reviews.title: BROKE WEN I GOT EM ------Update got a replacement free of charge
customer_reviews.text: Broke when i got em, the left headphone could hardley hear the right one is loud. there needs to be more quality in the cable. Sound is ok excellent comfort. In the future i will be getting the hyper x cloud 2 headset. hyper x cloud 2 may be pricey but i know there quality is great. ------------- Update they have sent me a replacement free of charge, the replacement works great thank you for the replacement :) .
customer_reviews.author: Terrence

customer_reviews.title: I had to return mine unused.
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed with the sound quality. Supposedly advertised at over £70 but reduced on promotion. I took the original cost as an indicator of the quality I'd get. There is no way these cans would compare with leading brands of a similar price. Disappointed, I retuned them and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Winbolt

customer_reviews.title: nearly there
customer_reviews.text: product arrived on time and was as described, i did not contact the seller, noise cancellation ok, sound quality impaired br crackle and hiss during movement. if you want to sit still and listen to a cd or record on the hi fi these are ok but don't move. Yes i checked to make sure the cables were firmly inserted into headphone jack on amplifier and headphonesthemselves. you are also supplied with a cable suitable for ipods or phones again good sound quality as long as you don't move, if you want to plug in the ipod do household chores etc then the movement causes crackle again, sit still or stand still you're ok
customer_reviews.author: mark crosby

customer_reviews.title: A reason they’re cheap?
customer_reviews.text: These finally arrived. Worked perfectly well for five days, but now seem to have a faulty connection. Shame because they were initially very good - great sound. I have to fiddle about with the connector now. Ah, can’t be bothered to send them back, so out comes the roll of insulating tape...
customer_reviews.author: AG60

customer_reviews.title: Defective design
customer_reviews.text: Sad to say - these are rubbish! Only use them for listening to music at bedtime. The input connector has now disintegrated completely! Yes they are 'only cheap' but definitely NOT cheerful!! Not fit for purpose. Ps. I treated them very kindly. Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eastbrake

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with my desktop pc ...mostly good , sound quality is good and comfortable to wear ..2 issues , when I first plugged it in , I had to manoeuvre the lead that goes into the headphones as the sound wasn't quite right , was fine after I adjusted it but makes me wonder if the connection into the headphone has any great last lastability , the lead is fairly short , fine for mp3 players but not great if you need a bit more length ...great value for money but the connection to the headphones does worry me a bit
customer_reviews.author: Superdee

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture, performs just like the description, basically. I use both the leads provided one side for keyboard and one side for phone/tablet. The sound quality is much better than my in-ear headphones. It works perfectly and they look expensive, very good finish with stainless steel and proper screws, multiple flexible joints and very soft earmuffs. It came with a black dust-cover. The packaging (box) was very smart (ie if you wanted to give this as a present). I liked the fact you can buy different colours, especially for people sharing a house. There is also a 2 year warranty that you can sign up for. I do not regret the purchase in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Frogs_breath

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable headphones and listening to music is enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: These OneOdio Headphones are exactly what we were looking for. Playing music, composing music, writing music and being able to enjoy it without any barrier how great is that!. These are very comfortable headphones and that's very important for us., while the time spent on the piano is too long to be wearing heavy and unwieldy headphones. They get my sign of approval. Thanks Amazon and thanks OneOdio.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Alfonso Van Delsen

customer_reviews.title: For the price, the sound is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I got these looking for a decent sound and range response for my DAW setup (Reason 11.0) I am just blown away, the range in these is beautiful, I can hear everything, even stupid mistakes in my production that were not apparent with my previous setup. Bass hits the middle of your head on these, in fact the sound range and quality out of these is only a degree below being a visual experience. Percussive bass is clean and sharp. High end frequencies are really well supported. Aesthetically they do the trick, they look great and if I'm a judge of engineering quality (I am, it's my job) they are built to last. Could not be more pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. S. Bridge

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are well made, the sound quality is good and look the part but they fall short for two reasons. First the folding cans are annoying as they only open one way and you have to fiddle with them to orientate them correctly and second they are too heavy. It feels like my head is in a vice and I have to keep adjusting them to maintain any level of comfort. I’ve waited several weeks before writing a review and have to say they are disappointing after so many positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Scubaboo

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, comfortable and soft on your ears, great sound
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would try these out as I needed a new pair of headphones and these looked good for the price. I was not disappointed by these, as the design was good and quality of sound is very nice for the price, soft and comfortable on your head and ears. I thought the idea of the cable entering either side (left or right headphone) was a great touch and can really help you out so the cable is not getting in your way and crossing over, so if the source you are plugged into is to your left place the cable in your left side and vice versa. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: THIRD TIME... Unlucky.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these earphones THREE times now and THREE TIMES they've broke. I'm not even bothering asking for a return refund now, I am just DONE with this brand and these earphones. When they work they're great, but the fact that the wire isn't fully attached to the headset means one swift move your earphone wire comes flying out your device, it's almost like they're designed to fail and break over time. You'd almost thing it was an Apple product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McG

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good, I like the bass
customer_reviews.text: I had few headphones like 3 or 4 but never with the NICE bass. It rather gives some color to the music and I like it. The sound quality seems OK, I suspect highs are slightly distorted but not entirely sure. it is still - better as expected and very good for the price of £29 Therefore it deserves top score for the price. it is the first time I can listen to music and switch off the equalizer and be happy with it. Normally I need to play with equalizer to get some more decent sound. Everyone likes a bit of bass.
customer_reviews.author: KMZ

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.text: These were bought as a gift for my wife. She uses them with her smartphone to listen to group chats on a forum. They are very comfortable to wear over long periods, (up to three hours) and have good clear sound transmission. They come with alternative jack plugs for multiple uses, but she has only used them with her phone so far. Her only minor gripe was that she could still hear the TV in the background when she was sitting in the living room, so they are not 100% noise-cancelling. Otherwise, they are value for money all-purpose headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Beetleypete

customer_reviews.title: Either size of audio jack will work as input on these cans with supplied cables.
customer_reviews.text: I like these cans. They're light. They sound good. The supplied cables are great. I bought them for recording a podcast. My existing Bluetooth headphones had a built in microphone and my system defaulted to that rather than my nice condenser mic. The long cable supplied with these ones has no mic so no problem. It has a 3.5mm jack one end and a 6mm on the other. Depending upon your set up you can use this cable either way round because the cans have a 6mm input on the left ear and a 3.5mm on the right. Absolutely no hesitation in recommending these.
customer_reviews.author: D. Vallance

customer_reviews.title: Great for Music Instruments
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones to use with my electric piano. For the cost, the sound quality very good. The headphones are light in weight and therefore I can wear them for long periods of time without them hurting. The added feature of being able to share audio with another person is great, prevents having to use an audio splitter. The only downside is when the music is on a high volume, this can be heard through the headphones by other people. However I would recommend these headphones if you are looking for a budget pair of headphones, for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: MIA LE BAO

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually use headphones as I rarely listen to audio of anykind on a mobile device. Bought these as I was going to use a keyboard in my flat. They exceeded my expectations considering the price and my mate, who is knowledgeable on audio quality, thinks they are very good. Unfortunately I was not able to use the keyboard properly due to arthritis so a young relative has it and the ‘phones’ and I have received very favourable reports from a grateful parent regarding the noise cancellation qualities of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Billyg

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones but incorrect jack
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones for pretty much everything you could want. I would ideally like to have the sound be a little bit louder at times. I also received a jack that didn't fit into my phone or even any of my older Android ones so I had to pay for a correct extra jack because the customer service of this company never bothered to reply to my emails. Would not buy from this company again and when I need new headphones with look at a different make as I made sure to check before ordering that it was suitable for my phone and what I received wasn't fully suitable.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound & comfortable feel for a good price
customer_reviews.text: My old headphones broke so I gave these a try. Was a little skeptical given how cheap they were (compared to other headphones) but am very pleasantly surprised. They are the most comfortable headphones I have ever owned - my wife always jokes I have a big head, maybe these just have more ‘room’ - and I have owned a lot in my life, whether for gaming or music. The sound quality is also the best Ive ever had but admittedly I am not an audio technical guru so can’t comment in the specs. Great sound, great bass, great feel.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cartman

customer_reviews.title: Great value and feels like good quality earphones for price point. Recommended
customer_reviews.text: For the price point I have to agree with the majority of reviewers. Have been looking for over ear headphones as I have developed inner ear issues and so affordability and sound quality were of paramount priority. Whilst the base is slightly over heavy and the clamp a bit too secure in the ears....can feel tight....the sound is excellent and the cancellation of noise satisfactory. Great value earphones and really pleased with purchase hence 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: ZeitGhoul (music is my sanctuary)

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Decent For THe Money.
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones. The ability to reverse the connecting lead to suit either size of plug is very useful. Also, the audio quality and frequency response is pretty good. They are comfortable to wear, not heavy either. I must admit, I was not expecting them to be as good as they are. Sure you can purchase better, however, you will have to pay much more. Can recommend these. ( However if you have superlative Hi Fi, then please be realistic ).
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: They're OK
customer_reviews.text: The noise cancellation is done by the foam ear cup. It's not an electronic system. They are cumbersome and the right ear piece turns the wrong way around each time I take them off. This makes putting them back on again difficult. They make my ears very warm and they press on my head quite hard. This adversely affects comfort as time progresses. The sound is fairly good, which helps. All in all, I should have spent more money an a better model.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Pimlett

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: IN THREE WEEKS I HAVE THROWN THESE CANS FROM MY HEAD OLYMPIC STYLE FROM MY HEAD MORE TIMES THAN MULTI PLACATION EXISTS.WHY THE THE SWIVEL? (SWIVELHEADS)-WOW.BEFORE RETAILLING ,HOW ABOUT USING IN THE LAB.BON HEAD VOYAGE .BEEN TRAVELLING FOR 3 SCORE &TEN .COMPLETELY CANNED.SEARCHING FOR THE PERFECT RENDERING OF SILENCE.THIS EQUIPMENT SUCCEEDS BY NOT WEARING ! WOW.PARADOX WINS /HANDS DOWN.COMFORTABLE WHEN YOU WORK OUT HOW TO SWIVEL HEAD TO MATCH THE HELMET.ELONGATING NECK LINGYOURS CRITIC
customer_reviews.author: gerry

customer_reviews.title: pretty decent headphones
customer_reviews.text: affordable but good sound quality. and my favoite feature, removable aux cable. the jack is almost always what breaks on headphones. make that an easy fix and you've got a companion for your ears for years. love the 6 on one side, means i can plug 'em into an amp and not annoy my neighbors at 3AM when random inspirtation hits, the cable it comes with however allows you to plug directly into a PC or phone. points docked slightly for extended use (maybe 3 hours?) mking the muscles around my ears ache a little bit. but pretty sure thats just cuz i have big ears haha
customer_reviews.author: chris west

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: We bought one set of these headphones but were so impressed we bought a second set. They are adjustable so they fit different size heads, they fold up so it makes them easy to store. The sound quality is excellent, and are very comfy to wear. Both cables will work with devices, we havent used them on DJ equipment so can't comment.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs R

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price but not noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s quite good. The sound is clear and crisp however it is definitely not noise cancelling. Although the headphones were definitely not made out of expensive or quality materials they are surprisingly sturdy and beyond comfortable. Being able to switch and remove different kind of cables is very handy as I use them during leisure time, at work and even when I play the piano. For the price I’d recommend it but not if you are looking for a noise cancelling product.
customer_reviews.author: Cassye

customer_reviews.title: Tension lost in right headphone
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones last year to play my electric drums with and they are definitely great for sound. Unfortunately not even a year later (as of today) the right headphone has somewhat lost tension to keep the headphone close to my ear so now instead of a good noise cancellation and ability to focus on music and the drums im playing i cant do this anymore as there is a gap under my right ear lobe which lets in all unwanted noise and renders them useless now. Sad to write this as these were my favourite by far.. Also 3 star for comfort based on this happening. Overall good equipment
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the £30 price reduced from £70. There’s no way I’d have taken a gamble at £70 on a make I've never heard of but the £30 was doable so I did and they’re awesome. The bass and overall sound quality is fantastic. A lot like my Marshall Bluetooth speaker. The noise cancelling claim I’m always dubious about but I’ve had to take to turning all the lights out when using them at work in case I miss a shout. They’re great. A bit too great😃
customer_reviews.author: Mr Darren N Easton

customer_reviews.title: good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought these headphones because my laptop's sound is very poor, and I am very happy with the headphones's quality, it improves sound so much, I can watch my films on around 8% of sound there as without headphones I could not hear my laptop's sound on 100%. also, it was a good offer, less then 50% of price. They are compact because of foldable parts, the ends swivel, so just need to get used to that. The earpieces themselves are nice, soft and comfortable, there is also adjustment for length over a head.
customer_reviews.author: justkarlson

customer_reviews.title: excellent value, brilliant sound quality and isolation! Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money, really good sound. Although not actually noise cancelling the block out most background noise (couldn't hear people talking to me with them on with no music playing). The one thing I would say is the leads are a little short to run from mixer when playing instruments, but a £2 extender gets round that or just plug in a longer lead (mind blown)! Like the ability to switch out the leads. The fact you can chain them or run your instrument in AND a backingtrack separately is perfect for practicing.Feel solid and with a 2yr guarantee you won't go far wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: At my age I have seen decades of headphone innovation. I also have headphones going back many many years. Without any doubt these are the most comfortable units I have ever used. Even when wearing glasses for extended periods of over 4 hours these are very comfortable and do not place undue pressure on my ears. The sound reproduction is extremely good across a nice wide audio spectrum. The only downside is that the sound can leak out of the units so people near can hear it. Would I buy again. Absolutely without a doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones with an important feature of dual connection into it.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good headphone for my daughters during this work from home times. When they play the piano or other devices it becomes difficult to listen to other calls. Cutting it short, I must say that it is a good piece of kit with two inputs e.g. you can play and listen to the piano and also connect your phone for metronome input. Very well thought feature. I am using it from last 2-3 weeks and glad that it is serving well.
customer_reviews.author: Chander

customer_reviews.title: Decant but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I guess these headphones are decent for the price so I can't complain too much, but the padding around the ears is not comfortable, and the sound messes up whenever the wire is positioned wrongly, which can easily happen. These are monitoring headphones, not bass driven, so of course the sounds quality isn't as impressive as regular headphones. These are designed for DJs and producers so they can monitor the sounds accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headphones, Amazed for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mainly to watch TV at night, until I had the money to get a more expensive, well known make at a later date. Though to be honest, after using them, I don't see the need, not in the foreseeable future. The sound is great, I watched Jurassic Park when I first got them (has to be done when checking sound for films on any kind of output lol) The clarity of sound and the balance, although not 5.1 was extremely impressive, as was the bass. I plugged it into my denon amplifier, only because my TV doesn't have a Jack socket, whether this helped or not I don't know. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: A bargain
customer_reviews.text: For the sum of £16.79 on an Amazon Daily Deal promotion, these headphones represent a remarkable bargain. I don't know if the £79.99 RRP is just a ploy, to make the discount seem bigger, but the sound quality and comfort of these headphones are excellent, and exceptional for the price. I will add OneOdio to the slew of third party manufactures whose products warrant further inspection. Sound is a matter of personal taste in headphones; but these are detailed, balanced and bright. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: patsy sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am no expert but the quality of sound has exceeded my expectations. They also have a feel of quality about them. I have listened to various headphones in various stores. As an ordinary listener I genuinly cannot tell the difference between these and a £200 set. Love the fact that they come with 2 wires (no batteries needed!) One is 3.5mm at both ends - the other is 3.5mm at one and and 6.5mm at the other. The headphones have two optional slots - so you can swap the ends around depending on the device you are listening through. Brilliant!!
customer_reviews.author: Donkee

customer_reviews.title: I am a fabulous keyboard player.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I am with my headphones on. My problem was always that as the keyboard was in the lounge I could only play it when I was alone in the house. Now with these headphones I can sit and tinker with my keys whenever I feel like it. Best of all the noise-cancelling means that the TV if it is on, does not cause a distraction and I can concentrate on my music. Great sound with good Bass output well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: David Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my Mom because she like to listen to her radio at night. They seem very well made were easy to set up and are very comfortable as they have head size adjustments so you can get them to fit comfortably over your ears. The main reason I choose them was because of the 3m cable that comes with it, of which 1m is coiled and stretchy which is very useful because her old sets cable was too short. It also comes with a second shorter cable featuring a microphone and button for portable devices. Overall they seem very nice and have a variety of colours.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these headphones to use with my tablet and they are very good . I did not want to spend a fortune as I only use them sporadically so these were ideal , they do everything I want them to do , they are comfortable to wear and the sound reproduction is more than good enough for me , if you are an HiFi fan and listen to lots of music then they may not be refined enough but for every day use they are very good .
customer_reviews.author: SPEEDY

customer_reviews.title: Keep your money in your pocket!
customer_reviews.text: Keep your money in your pocket or stick with better known names. My mum used to say you get what you pay for - so I guess I should have know better. They have a nice arch when you get them out the box but get them on your head and they dig in like mad. Very short cable and Mega cheap finish. May as well put them in the bin. I have them one star but to be honest I didn’t want to give them that but no zero choice! Dreadful!
customer_reviews.author: Mel B

customer_reviews.title: Great - when they worked.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after less than three months. Returns only less than a month after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Peter Stamford

customer_reviews.title: Stunning for that money
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this for watching videos, listening to music and editing podcasts = for hours a day. Sound is excellend, very clear. Headphones are wery comfortable, but beware - they may be too small for a larger head. Noise isolation 100%, the sound coming from outside is moderately isolated. The cable is brilliant - springs on the ends, so that it does not broke. The spring on the cable itself is also a big deal. Nicely, carefully made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for Buck
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter and she loves them, she finds them especially comfortable and loves the sound quality, I have taken a listen and find that they are indeed very comfy and sound very good for the price paid, hopefully they will last for quite some time as most budget phones fail in the connecting wire department, that's what killed her not so old sennheisers. Time will obviously tell.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. M. Healey

customer_reviews.title: Poor Plug Connection
customer_reviews.text: Only get sound out of one ear. Wiggling the plug where it attaches to the headphones reveals the connection there is faulty. Problem is with the headphones as different cables/plugs result in the same - sound in one ear only. Poor quality. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: I have now had these a couple of days. Sound quality is great, nice base. Very comfy to say I wear glasses. I like the fact that the cable is detachable and can be easily replaced. As with all headphones with a lead, a short 90deg extension is very helpful for some devices if put in pockets etc. Sit fully over the ears to outside noise is minimal. Seem to be a good quality build, but as with all things time will tell. May also get some Bluetooth ones. 30 hours battery life sounds good.
customer_reviews.author: GAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for small price
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with these headphones at this price £30 UK,...Super tight bass, with punchy mids and crystal clear high end,...as far as I can hear anyway,.. I may have lost a few of those frequencies in my ears over the years as I'm a professional musician. :-) But they do sound great! Quality of headsets is a little fragile but what do you expect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tillybelle

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than a year in normal use.
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones, very comfy but fragile wiring. This is my second set of these, now both are broken after only about 8 months of normal use. How can I get in touch with the manufacturer ? Does anyone have the contact details ? I want to try to claim under their guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: Robbo

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love them, only had them for over a week, I was dubious at first as I’d never heard of the brand, but absolutely love them, the sound quality is superb for what I need it for. It’s not Bluetooth, but that’s not what I wanted, it’s wired headphones. There are other headphones in that brand that cater for Bluetooth. I use it for listening to music on my iPod, I would definately recommend. Plus you get 2 years warranty when you register and sign up.
customer_reviews.author: Cybilt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical to buy them because they are so cheap, honestly - they are spot on. I just bought all the kit for my home studio and realised I didn't have any headphones. Obviously after spending so much money it was gutting, found these late at night and read the other reviews and took the risk. They are fantastic. Sound great, no crackling, durable, come with a nice case, come with aux and jack leads. Really truly am impressed with this product for the price. I never leave reviews but these guys deserve one!
customer_reviews.author: Joe K

customer_reviews.title: Not quite noise cancelling, but good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product overall, great bass, but the building material is not the best, mainly plastic and it does feel cheap. Very comfortable over the ears and you can wear them for hours no problem. But no noise cancellation at all, while I play my guitar on low volume I can still hear people talking or the television. But for the price I would suggest them; they come with all the cables, and the AUX includes a microphone as well so you can use it to make calls too. the sound quality is good and they are very comfortable, that's the main thing after all.
customer_reviews.author: Danilo

customer_reviews.title: Heady stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, comfortable, not too heavy, and good sound quality. I am well aware that with certain name brands you pay for the name, not the quality. My son really likes these. He thinks they are very good value for money. BTW you can buy them from a certain electronics chain store for £30.00, I don't mind paying more to support local retailers but a 50% mark up? No thanks.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable and good sound
customer_reviews.text: No problems with these; very good over-ear headphones, comfortable, good tones. Overall very good value. I found the swivel action of the phones is probably a bit too much, you have to fiddle with them a bit to get them into the right position,, but they therefore allow for the perfect positioning of the phones on your head, so overall this is a positive point.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I’m in the process of learning the electric guitar and have been struggling to find a set of headphones which give a bit of freedom of movement and comfort. Thanks to the large coiled cable that is supplied with the headphones and also the great comfort of the headphones that is a distraction that i no longer have! Another benefit is that i can plug one side of the headphones into my amp and the other side of the headphones into my phone to play music at the same time whilst jamming along to tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jimmy.

customer_reviews.title: Bit of a Steal!
customer_reviews.text: I paid less than 20 quid for these, so didn't have huge expectations, but I have been pleasantly surprised. The sound quality is more than decent and they seem well made for the price point. I bought them for home studio monitoring purposes. They clearly aren't truly neutral, but are perfectly adequate for my (very) amateur purposes. The two cables supplied are also good quality, and ensure that the headphones are versatile. A wee carry case would have been good, but I certainly wouldn't quibble given what I paid. Well worthy of 5 stars at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Drooper70

customer_reviews.title: Good headphone
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who has a mixing set and had dj'es for many years. He absolutely loves them and it has gotten him back into the groove! 😉 The only complaint that he has is that the cable length is too short for his needs. He states that the sound quality is fantastic and noise cancellation is very good. All in all a very good product for the price paid
customer_reviews.author: crinklykarma

customer_reviews.title: Shocked, these are amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Buying these headphones for £20 I didn't expect much but holy crap. The sound quality on these are better than £200 headphones I've owned, the materials are very durable, comfortable and luxurious and the amount of sound it blocks out without any music on is shocking, very well designed. The microphone on the main cord is surprisingly excellent too with amazing clarity. These are the first headphones I can listen to music on without cranking the volume all the way up. Went through an intensive sound test to see if it can handle all sound frequencies and transition smoothly between sounds and it was perfect. Buy these while you can I would say!
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: The Headphones are fine. Great noise cancelling. Pretty comfy. There's a button on the cable that is about collar bone height when wearing the headphones. Which is good when listening to music on a mobile, as when you press the button once it pauses the music. And when you press it twice quickly it plays the next song. However this button has bad wire insulation or something, as by simply brushing the button on my shirt or just simply touching it, causes the audio to go static and cut in and out. And it starts to get super frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound and comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: Was supprised by this cheap headphone set. Only issue that isn't an issue for me is the small jack that goes to your phone with the mic on it crackles when you turn the jack in the head phone but I just use the other cable supplied.. Awesome bass for such a cheap headphone set, looks better in person than on the photos quite impressed tbh
customer_reviews.author: Mr. L. G. Gibbins

customer_reviews.title: Get yourself a pair, it also swivels to allow you to take them off easily.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is my toy. Switch on the TV, or music. Lie down on the settee and enjoy. Very comfortable wearing them, light, no fiddling around adjusting to feet well, the sound quality is very good. No disturbing neighbours or anyone else in the home. Could not believe the price. I even plug it into my mobile to watch YouTube, music. The cable is of good quality, no tangling all over the place. At last I have my lovely head phones. Well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Poshest

customer_reviews.title: Very good bass
customer_reviews.text: Needed a replacement. As I listen to all sorts of music, from rock, classical, pop, country & western, reggae, pop, techno, Latin American... I needed some earphones that will produce the music as it was supposed to. The Bass is good to excellent. You can even hear in the background the other instruments. Very comfortable & light. There is also the additional socket for another person to listen at the same time. Only 'downside' is there is no separate volume adjustment button on the headphones, but that is just me being 'picky' as I had one on my previous set. It is good value & you will not be disappointed as it is quite stylish too.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, loud, bassy
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these headphone in 2019. They broke due to a fault inside the headphone speakers piverts and I've been trying to get a response from the company for awhile now. I've emailed them via there contact email and also tried calling the 008 number. 008 number don't work on my mobile I've also contact amazon. Inside the product box inside the manual states that there is 2 years warranty needed to be claimed. I claimed and contacted the company yet they haven't responded for the past 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Keron Salmon

customer_reviews.title: Ok set of Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bass quality is good surprisingly... but they can be a little uncomfortable because the foam does not mould to the shape of my head. Sound LEAKS, so everybody hears what you’re listening to. But they’re worth the price for a temporary set of headphones. The build quality is good however... and are nice and compact when folded.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, perfect for musicians
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound quality, stylish design but a bit fiddly. The headphones can be rather cumbersome due to the amount of moving parts. I find myself struggling to get them in position, occasionally. But once they are on, they're fabulous! Sound quality is excellent, perfect for my bass guitar and hip-hop music. Everything the user needs is provided, including -quite generously- a handy carrying bag and a competitive warranty. My music sounds great, background noise is blocked out and I can rest assured the item is under warranty. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liam J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my PC that I use to record and mix guitar and midi tracks on, as well as watching movies and listening to music. The optional jack sizes and included cables are a welcome feature! Haven't tried mixing with them yet but they seem great at cancelling out external noise when watching movies/listening to music, very pleased with sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Garry Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great audio quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: A bargain buy , great balanced audio quality for a working musician, good build quality and LOVE the fact you can unplug the cord and use different sizes - 1/8' or 1/4" jacks - for different applications. They fold down to a reasonable size and look good too - not an issue on either of these anyway - they sound great!.Well worth the Prime day deal and wouldn't hesitate to buy again at full amazon price.
customer_reviews.author: Alan McPike

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the joints
customer_reviews.text: The joint inside broke, now one side is messed up. It's actually very decent but not strong a metal version would be ideal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as Christmas gift for my father, at the beginning of June the arm holding the ear cups broke. I have contacted oneodio by messenger and email sending photographs and details of the order. The earphones are still under warranty but I have not had the issue resolved. The customer service is very very poor as long delays between communications.
customer_reviews.author: Quality lady

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones for whatever use you want. Good noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are excellent, much better than I expected. Wether you’re just listening to music on your phone, or using them on a mixing desk. Great sound and I love the fact you can use them with the large or small jack. Nice long cable for the PA desk and smaller one for you phone. I love the protective bag that they fit in and fold very neatly
customer_reviews.author: T.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely surprised by how these headphones handle various music styles. They're lightweight but feel slightly tight for my big head, making me feel like they're squeezing my head from the sides :D Two different length cables to choose from depending on the scenario are a great touch, and love the mike/button on the 3.5mm jack cable too! No more switching headphones when my mum calls me on Skype while I'm playing music on my iPad!
customer_reviews.author: DareBak

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: The performance is remarkable given the price of these headphones, with a solid bass component. They are comfortable to wear, having good-sized over-the-ear cushioning and a wide range of headband adjustment. The double ended lead is a very good solution of trying to find small adaptors to allow connection via a 3.5 mm jack.
customer_reviews.author: WJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money - wish i'd invested more money for better though.
customer_reviews.text: ok headphones - connection on the 3.5mm jack is scratchy. Got round this by using the bigger jack. Can only wear for 1.5hour before they start to annoy me...but i guess i'm just sensitive. Build quality is nice (except for the scratchy 3.5mm jack cable) & sound quality is ok but have heard better. For the price these are probably the best you can get.
customer_reviews.author: Comerino

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I bought these just for listening to music really but I might use them for gaming too cause i have to say; really good sound, no fuzziness and they dont struggle at full volume (I listen to metal so it's often an issue) the only criticism I have is they are really big on my head...but i dont really mind I'm still really happy with them! They are also really, REALLY comfortable..
customer_reviews.author: rosie williams

customer_reviews.title: Music sounds better
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant set of headphones. My daughter had bought a pair and I was impressed with the sound quality. I like alot of bass the headphones were good enough, the sounds were very clear. I end up listening to music a bit too long with these headphones. Such a treat. Oh nice that they have a little storage bag too. : )
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Fay

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product ! Shocking
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 pairs of these for my sons for Christmas. It’s the 9th January and 1 pair has stopped playing sound though an iPad and the other pair is inconsistent on sound quality. Shocking for the price! Avoid avoid avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Kev 74

customer_reviews.title: It was recommended to me by the technical advisor on the Just ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item to attach to the audio socket of my telephone as I am very deaf in both ears. It was recommended to me by the technical advisor on the Just Answers web site. I can only hear a faint sound in one ear and it is insufficient for me to be able to carry on a telephone conversation. I have now been trying to get back into conversation with my many friends and I am feeling very isolated. It appears to be a very well made item and for other applications I am sure it would be OK -just not for mine
customer_reviews.author: David J. Dyble

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality and sound
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous value for money pair of budget over-ear headphones. Build quality is really solid. They feel much more expensive than they are. Sound quality is great, and although they don't have noise cancellation they do cocoon you nicely from the outside world. The only criticism is that there is a lot of sound bleed from the back of the cups, so not really suitable for use on public transport, unless you want to annoy the person next to you. Best for indoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I was dubious about buying cheap earphones . Wow what a surprise they are great love the bass sound quality is good . My husband was so impressed he got another pair but different colour
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra gillison

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: good product for the price. they are rather conspicuous on the head, but for the cost and bearing in mind I'm only wearing them at home that doesn't matter. sound quality is good and the two jack plug sizes are handy. really comfortable to wear and soft over the top the head unlike my last pair of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Every sound is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is crystal clear with perfect noise cancellation and base quality. I tried them out watching Star trek the next generation and the sound of the ship I had never noticed before could be heard as it travelled along. I now use them on my keyboard and the sound is terrific, perfect for any listening.
customer_reviews.author: partner

customer_reviews.title: Stunning headphones
customer_reviews.text: As someone coming from using standard Apple earbuds for the better part of 10 years, I wasn't prepared for how incredible these headphones would be. The depth of the sound is amazing and with the balance of the EQ you can hear individual parts of music coming from different angles. For example, listening to an Iron Maiden track I could hear the individual nuances of each instrument rather than just a cluster of sound that makes up the bog standard MP3 audio from earphones. Can't recommend these more!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Cheep As Chips. But Great
customer_reviews.text: The price what great I.E cheap. Didn't think they would Work well at this price point but Well surprised😀🔥🔥😀. . And the ohms are really good as the minimum ohms I can use is 32ohms on my headphone Amplifier. So if have less can blow headphones up if don't Learn about ohms..... Great product.. made of plastic but can live with that.. can get same model with better materials. But price goes up. Upto you.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Lazarou

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The colour is lovely on these headphones and they are nice and comfortable. However, I bought them for their longer cord, but the spring/coil in the middle is too strong, so that if I try to use the fuller length they just pull the headset off me, so that mechanism for extra length is pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: Herb25

customer_reviews.title: Radiohead's Paranoid Android sounds quality through these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a pair of these headphones for my partner. They had very good reviews on other websites and were in the top 10 best headphones to buy. For the price I couldn't argue with that, so I ordered them. I tried them out listening to Paranoid Android by Radiohead and you can hear every little detail and pick out every single instrument in the song, compared to listening to it just through a sound system with good speakers. The bass is also brilliant. So that's me ordered a pair for myself. Absolute magic!
customer_reviews.author: Lulabell

customer_reviews.title: they work, and for this price point this is all that matters :)
customer_reviews.text: They aren't bad at all. Good quality sound. Very good cables. My main problem is that the pivoting system (which is generally a good feature) is too loose and annoying. While DJ'ing I sometimes need to quickly grab the headphones and then the pads are pivoting all over the place and I lose like 5-10 valuable seconds trying to sort this mess.
customer_reviews.author: AQ

customer_reviews.title: A Good, Well-balanced Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Sound Quality! I was particularly attracted to these headphones because a small number of reviews complained about the lack of (a thumping?) bass. This was just what I was looking for: a well-balanced Sound across the spectrum, and this is just what the OneOdio headphones provide. I’m delighted!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Good value headphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality from these closed back headphones is really very good given the price. They are comfortable to wear, adjustable for size and the ear pieces have a swivel function. I find them adequate for use as studio monitor phones and like the fact that two different leads are provided. They are of a light weight construction which makes them easy to wear for longer listening sessions though they may not be as durable as more expensive pairs. Overall I am pleased with the performance and, given the price, would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Rover

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a Yamaha P45 digital piano. These are the only pair of over the ear headphones I've tried. I did quite a bit of research and read many many reviews. I really don't want to spend alot of money and I thought if I didn't like then I'd just send them back. I'm pleased to report these have met my every expectation, they look and sound great, are comfortable and I'd certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: social-misfit

customer_reviews.title: A bit tight but value for money.
customer_reviews.text: The earphones are okay, sound is quite good for the price although I’m not using it for music, only for watching videos or listening to the lessons. Note for the people with bigger heads, it will be quite tight. I found it gets uncomfortable after about half hour or even less. I dislike the tension. Also a cable could have been a bit longer, much shorter than my previous headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly S

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones for this price
customer_reviews.text: I like them for few reasons combined: solid build quality, locking plug connectors, big ear muffs, sound - not ideal, but decent, and reasonable price. Regarding sound - it's slightly bassed (which I personally like), and misses some definition in highs, but is overall enjoyable. Definitely good for gaming and daily listening for the music, may be not best choice for audiophile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
